New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored 50 runs,Arshdeep Singh took 4 wickets,India won by 7 wickets
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma underperformed,Saurabh Netravalkar struck early with the ball,Rishabh Pant was dismissed,Crucial partnership between Suryakumar Yadav and Shivam Dube
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma won the toss,Aaron Jones expected a close game,India's bowling unit was crucial
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised the team's resilience,Aaron Jones reflected on the bowling performance,Arshdeep Singh highlighted his bowling strategy
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was conducive to seam bowling,India's win secured their place in the Super 8s,USA's performance was penalized due to slow over rate
